ch0158_00_carnet/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh my! 
How nice to see you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0158_00_carnet/0101_0701_02_10:
All the players are here! The stage is set to enjoy
yet another day on Pasio!
ch0158_00_carnet/0601_0701_01_10:
Since I’m an actress, sometimes people will talk
to me because they’re fans of mine!
ch0158_00_carnet/0601_0701_02_10:
Often, they’ll say that watching me act gave them
courage or cheered them up!
ch0158_00_carnet/0601_0701_03_10:
But I also get a lot of energy from my fans when
I meet them!
ch0158_00_carnet/0602_0701_01_10:
People change every day, and no moment is
exactly the same as another.
ch0158_00_carnet/0602_0701_02_10:
Even if I play the same character, I always act a
little different from how I did the day before!
ch0158_00_carnet/0602_0701_03_10:
I hope people enjoy seeing that transformation! It
surely makes it more engaging!
ch0158_00_carnet/0603_0701_01_10:
As I continue my work as an actress, one thing
that I find important is challenging myself to try
new things.
ch0158_00_carnet/0603_0701_02_10:
I plan to continue challenging myself to play the
kinds of characters I’ve never acted before!
ch0158_00_carnet/0603_0701_03_10:
Every time I act as a different character, I feel I
encounter a new me!
ch0158_00_carnet/0603_0701_04_10:
My job as an actress is to constantly search for my
own untapped potential.
ch0158_00_carnet/0604_0701_01_10:
I once traded my Pokémon to a Trainer who 
challenged me for my Champion title.
ch0158_00_carnet/0604_0701_02_10:
Of course, it was a little bittersweet, but I said
good-bye to my Pokémon and wished it the best.
ch0158_00_carnet/0604_0701_03_10:
At the same time, its new family welcomed it with
open arms, which was so heartwarming.
ch0158_00_carnet/0604_0701_04_10:
The Pokémon I traded is back in Kalos, but it’s still
so very special to me!
ch0158_00_carnet/0605_0701_01_10:
Even if you’re facing something difficult, you’re
always able to have a positive outlook!
ch0158_00_carnet/0605_0701_02_10:
I think that’s one of the things about you that truly
makes you shine, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0158_00_carnet/0605_0701_03_10:
I’m sure the people around you have noticed that 
positive attitude of yours.
ch0158_00_carnet/0605_0701_04_10: I also feel happy when I’m next to you!
ch0158_00_carnet/1701_0701_01_10: Allow me to present you with this gift!
ch0158_00_carnet/1701_0701_02_10: I hope it helps you shine even brighter!
ch0158_00_carnet/1701_0702_01_10:
Any item can be good or bad depending on how
you use it.
ch0158_00_carnet/1701_0702_02_10: I’m sure you’ll find a way to put it to good use!
ch0158_00_carnet/2501_0701_01_10:
I have an identity as an actress—and also as
a Champion.
ch0158_00_carnet/2501_0701_02_10:
For both of these identities, I’m vigilant of the
fact that I’m seen by many people.
ch0158_00_carnet/2501_0701_03_10:
I do this so I can live up to the expectations of the
people cheering me on!
ch0158_00_carnet/2501_0701_04_10:
I try to portray myself as noble, passionate, and
shining bright...and of course, I try to show that
I truly enjoy both acting and battling.
ch0158_00_carnet/2501_0701_05_10: They’re what I view as my life’s work.
ch0158_00_carnet/2501_0702_01_10:
Being in the spotlight and having things expected
of me may sometimes feel like a burden.
ch0158_00_carnet/2501_0702_02_10:
But I always try to turn those expectations into
energy to make my heart and soul shine brightly!
ch0158_00_carnet/2511_0701_01_10:
I always strive to stay positive, but sometimes I do
experience disappointment.
ch0158_00_carnet/2511_0701_02_10: I do two things to make myself feel better:
ch0158_00_carnet/2511_0701_03_10: First, I remember the faces of all my fans.
ch0158_00_carnet/2511_0701_04_10: Second, I interact with my Pokémon!
ch0158_00_carnet/2511_0701_05_10:
That usually helps me regain my positivity, as it
reminds me that I’m not alone.
ch0158_00_carnet/2511_0702_01_10:
When you’re feeling down, try to think of who is
around you.
ch0158_00_carnet/2511_0702_02_10:
If you do that, there will always be people willing
to give your their support and cheer you on!
ch0158_00_carnet/3001_0701_01_10:
Every day is special and unique in some way.
We have to enjoy each and every one of them
to the fullest!
ch0158_00_carnet/3003_0701_01_10:
Our day-to-day experiences here on Pasio, big
and small, will all be part of a greater story
one day.
ch0158_00_carnet/3005_0701_01_10:
You and your Pokémon shine so brightly together...
I wouldn’t be surprised if you glow in the dark!
